title: Sharpay
longDescription: The Sharpay is the multi-share button for sites with blockchain-based rewards for content promotion for users. Multisharing is an opportunity to share the content in several networks in one click. Users receive rewards for the act of sharing or for the visits of other users via the shared links (depends on site settings). All that means the conversion growth for sites and comfortable sharing for users.
instructions: We have simplified the installation process Sharpay button to Cloudflare users. Users need to specify the site ID from app.sharpay.io in the Sharpay plug-in settings and configure the button's display on their site.
author: Sharpay ltd.

categories.title: Social & Communication
categories.description: Apps that make it easier to communicate with your customers.

help-code.helpvalue: To get site ID register your site here.

help-counter.helpvalue: Check if you want our button to show how many times your page was shared via Sharpay.

position.title: Select floating button position at the bottom of the page.

proposedApp.title: Sharpay
proposedApp.shortDescription: Cloudflare app for installation on you site Sharpay multisha
proposedApp.longDescription: The sharpay is the share and multi-share button for sites with blockchain-based rewards for content promotion for users. Multisharing is an opportunity to share the content in several networks in one click. Users receive rewards for the act of sharing or for the visits of other users via the shared links (depends on site settings). All that means the conversion growth for sites and comfortable sharing for users.
proposedApp.instructions: We have streamlined and simplified the whole button installing process for Cloudflare users. Users need only a site ID from app.sharpay.io and put it on the Sharpay app setting and save all his preferences.
proposedApp.author: Sharpay ltd.
